website_summaries.verdict: A light formula that has gained both satisfied customers and some concerns over the effectiveness and appearance of the product.
pros: Contains silk amino acids and collagen for a noticeably hydrated and glowing effect for many users
Has a nice, pleasant scent and the tendency to make many skin types feel soft and smooth after use
cons: A few reports of a burning or tingling sensation when on the face
Product doesn't appear as thick and gold as expected

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly and I can’t wait to see the results soon! Just got it 15 minutes ago! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Janelle ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great and Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Use it twice a week after using the 24K Gold Scrub. Cleared my acne and smoothens my face. Saving $75/month on facials with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: The product is amazing I love it I saw the affect of it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing I love it I saw the affect of it right away and I ordered now more for my friends and am telling all my friends and family about it every one who sees asks me how my my face is glowing now it’s becuse of this amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Serena Ramahi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome. I have dry skin and it moisturizing and light. It's easy to apply and take off. I've used it twice so far and I see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there
customer_reviews.text: After using this my skin is smooth. Last two times it felt like my face was tightening. It just makes you feel good
customer_reviews.author: Daro

customer_reviews.title: Felt like shards of glass
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Felt like shards of glass going on to face. Bought the made in USA one that is an Amazon’s choice - totally different and soothing
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: It does not peel
customer_reviews.text: It does not PEEL no matter how long you leave it on. it's more of us lotion and then you have to wipe it off with water and a towel VERY UNHAPPY Guess I will have to look for one that really works😥
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin, large pores, and my skin has a habit of randomly breaking out. This mask has stopped the breakouts, moisturizes my dry skin, and I can barely see my pores. I don’t even need to use certain primers to cover up my pores anymore! Plus I have this dark scar under my chin and I can see it lightening up every day. I know everyone’s skin is different and handled things differently, but this works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Whittler

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenation for your face!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! You don't need but maybe a quarter size for your face. Leave it on for 20 minutes..and boom...smoothness! Very lovely product. If you follow your regimen with a nice toner, your face will feel like a baby's behind!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Maria Damoulis

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it easily applied to my face. After I rinsed it off with warm water my face felt soft. Easy to remove, no scrubbing. I have only used it twice and I am noticing a glow on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mary manieri

customer_reviews.title: Glitters like gold
customer_reviews.text: I did look like a golden statue head when I put it on and had no expectations but I must admit my skin was noticeably brighter when I took it off. I've only used it once but I think it goes on so thin that it will also last a long time. Nice product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Lizthefoodie

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Healthy-looking Complexion
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this mask for less than a week and I can already see a subtle, healthy glow. It's gently and soothing, great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: The Child-like Empress

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It burns a slight bit, but wasn’t bad. It made my face glow and seemed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was spilled all over the box and the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! But, when they arrive the inside box was very moist. When, I open the box was not tight and it spilled all over the box, in the outside bottle. After I cleaned it up half way 1/3 of the product was gone. It was so messy, and that I don't wanna deal with returning the product. It wasn't worthy for the price I paid for. Sincerely, Carlita

customer_reviews.title: Try it. You won't regret it.

customer_reviews.text: This product dries my skin out really bad. It is not a moisturizer like it says and I have seen not one result from using this product. I am not a happy costumer.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t regret this buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product came super fast! White naturals made sure to keep updated with me on this order, which was really professional and sweet of them. The mask itself, is gorgeous! I got one for myself, and another for a gift. I am very excited to share this product with others.
customer_reviews.author: SHOPAHOLIC

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably hydrating to skin (less dryness and wrinkles), feels luxurious, smells great
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this product after ordering it for my mom, and after hearing about the benefits of gold on the skin. While I initially thought that this product could have been a gimmick, I have noticed immediate results as far as improving skin hydration and texture. Even if I have had a busy day and have been lazy about following my full skin routine (totally removing makeup, doing a facial scrub, etc), one treatment of this mask the next day completely restores my skin. The funny unexpected thing is that not only does it smell really nice, but if you accidentally get it into your mouth, it tastes sweet like honey (but don't eat it!! lol)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Attention! This mask is NOT a peel off mask!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where the low ratings came from. This is not suppose to peel off. No where in the description does it state this is a peel off mask, so just ignore those reviews. I really liked this mask. It left my face feeling moisturized, and it was easy to remove with a warm damp wash cloth. I do recommend using a mask brush to apply it for better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Harper

customer_reviews.title: *LEAKING/PACKAGING/STORAGE PROBLEM!!

product_meta.title: Labor Day Sale! 24K Gold Facial Mask By White Naturals:Rejuvenating Anti-Aging Face Mask For Flawless Skin, Reduces Fine Lines &Wrinkles,Clears Acne,Minimizes Pores,Moisturizes & Firms Up Your Skin
product_meta.description: The 24K Gold Facial Mask Is The Ultimate Skincare Product! Why wear gold only on your ears, neck and wrist? White Naturals gives you the opportunity to put gold on your entire face! And the best part? The 24K gold will restore your skin’s health and leave it flawless and imperfection-free! When other skincare products fail to repair your skin, the 24K gold face mask comes to the rescue, and the results are amazing! Are You Ready To Say Goodbye To Your Blemishes And Blackheads? Of course you are! Thanks to the anti-inflammatory 24K gold facial, this is not a difficult task anymore! The brightening gold face mask will remove the toxins of your skin and minimize your blemishes and pores. With regular use, your skin will be clear and free of acne and blackheads, and you will feel more confident because of it! You Don’t Need Painful Injections To Look Younger! Why go to a plastic surgeon to fill in your wrinkles? All you need isthe White Naturals 24K gold face mask! The facial mask will increase your collagen production, so your fine lines and wrinkles will be less prominent. The 24 karat face ask will also help you get rid of your acne scars and make your skin smoother and firmer! Your Flawless Face Is Just One Click Away! Do you want a healthy, glowing skin that is free of wrinkles, blemishes and imperfections? Then don’t waste any more time! It’s time to place an order, get the 24K gold facial mask and enjoy a luxurious spa treatment at home for much less money! Add The 24K Gold Facial Mask To Your Cart NOW!Product Description
feature_bullets: GOLD ANTI-AGING FORMULA: We can’t make your fine lines and wrinkles disappear, but we can definitely reduce their appearance! The 24K Gold Facial Mask is first and foremost an anti-aging facial treatment mask that will increase your collagen production and make your skin smoother and firmer. Everyone will tell you how rejuvenated and refreshed you look!

NO MORE ACNE AND SCARS: Do you want to have flawless skin even when you’re not wearing makeup? All you need is the 24K Gold Facial mask! The moisturizing face mask has anti-inflammatory properties, which will reduce your blemishes,heal your acne scars,clean your clogged pores and minimize them.Your face will soon be clearer than ever!

PAMPER YOUR FACIAL SKIN: Dry skin can be so annoying and it can even be painful. The 24 K Gold Facial Mask by White Naturals will help you moisturize your skin and restore its elasticity once again! Your skin will look healthy and glow, all thanks to the brightening 24K gold face mask!

YOUR SKIN NEEDS A DETOX: If you have oily skin, hyper-pigmentation and unexplainable breakouts, then it means that it’s time for a skin detox, so grab the 24 K Gold mask and apply it to your face! The anti-oxidant 24 K gold formula will remove the toxins from your skin, regulate your oil production and restore your skin’s health, just like magic!

A PLEASANT PROCEDURE:Wearing the 24K gold facial mask is a very luxurious and pleasant experience! Apply the gold mask on your clean,makeup –free skin and leave it for twenty minutes. Just remember to avoid the sensitive area around your eyes!Then remove the mask with water and you’re ready, looking better than ever ! Key Product Features
